content.raw:
I've also gotten intermittent camera failures in overnight testing that may be related:
~~~
169: [ RUN      ] CameraSensor.CheckNoise
169: 
169: Msg Waiting for masterMsg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
169: Msg Publicized address: 192.168.1.188
169: Dbg ServerFixture load in 0.09 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds
169: /tmp/gazebo_build/source/test/integration/camera_sensor.cc:311: Failure
169: Expected: (diffSum) != (0u), actual: 0 vs 0
169: /tmp/gazebo_build/source/test/integration/camera_sensor.cc:313: Failure
169: The difference between diffAvg/255. and noiseMean is 0.10000000000000001, which exceeds 3*noiseStdDev, where
169: diffAvg/255. evaluates to 0,
169: noiseMean evaluates to 0.10000000000000001, and
169: 3*noiseStdDev evaluates to 0.029999999999999999.
169: [  FAILED  ] CameraSensor.CheckNoise (2389 ms)
~~~
This failure happened 2 times out of 33 runs. It may be related since it was expecting two successive images with noise to be different, but they were actually exactly the same.
